Node.definition: = a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

Node.gloss: to lift up (someone's) head > to restore (someone's) confidence
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone else's) head; hence: = causative process by which deities help humans to find new confidence

Node.gloss: to lift up (someone's head) > to cause (someone) to look up with confidence
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone else's) head; hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans to be able to look up without shame
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with security, sometimes with death, sometimes with being inactive
= process by which humans open their eyes after sleep; ≈ also used in the figurative sense of becoming active after a period of inactivity, and of being restored to life after having died
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to uphold; hence: = action by which humans or deities provide help and supporting (other) humans

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
jaw, cheek
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
